data.content:
Illaoi: The Kraken Priestess

Illaoi is a powerful champion in the game League of Legends, known as the Kraken Priestess. She was released on November 24, 2015, and has since become a popular pick for players who enjoy dominating the top lane with her immense strength and unique playstyle.

Background Story

Illaoi hails from the brutal and unforgiving lands of Bilgewater, a treacherous port city known for its lawlessness and cutthroat nature. She is a fierce and devout priestess of the Great Kraken, Nagakabouros, who demands unwavering loyalty and strength from her followers.

Illaoi's journey to becoming the Kraken Priestess began when she was just a young girl. She was chosen by Nagakabouros to be his vessel, granting her immense power and a connection to the depths of the sea. Illaoi dedicated her life to serving the Great Kraken, honing her skills and becoming a formidable warrior.

As the Kraken Priestess, Illaoi's primary goal is to spread the teachings of Nagakabouros and test the faith of others. She believes that strength is the ultimate virtue and that those who are weak or lack conviction should be purged. Illaoi's faith is unyielding, and she is willing to do whatever it takes to prove her devotion to the Great Kraken.

Strengths

Illaoi is a juggernaut champion, excelling in close-quarters combat and dealing massive amounts of damage. Her kit revolves around her ability to summon tentacles from the ground, which she can use to attack her enemies and heal herself. This unique mechanic allows her to control the battlefield and punish opponents who dare to challenge her.

One of Illaoi's greatest strengths is her ability to sustain through fights. Her passive ability, Prophet of an Elder God, allows her tentacle attacks to heal her for a percentage of the damage dealt. This makes her incredibly difficult to kill in extended engagements, as she can constantly regenerate health while dishing out punishment.

Illaoi's Q ability, Tentacle Smash, is a powerful area-of-effect attack that damages all enemies hit and spawns a tentacle at the target location. These tentacles remain on the battlefield for a short duration and can be used to attack enemies within their range. This ability synergizes well with her other skills, allowing her to deal devastating damage to multiple targets at once.

Another key strength of Illaoi is her E ability, Test of Spirit. With this ability, Illaoi can target an enemy champion and rip their spirit from their body, tethering it to the location. While the spirit is tethered, the enemy champion becomes vulnerable, taking increased damage from Illaoi and her tentacles. If the enemy champion fails to destroy the spirit by damaging it, they will be hit with a powerful slow and have their defenses reduced.

Illaoi's ultimate ability, Leap of Faith, is a game-changer in team fights. When activated, Illaoi leaps into the air and slams down, summoning a tentacle for each enemy champion hit. These tentacles attack nearby enemies and become empowered, dealing additional damage. This ability can quickly turn the tide of a battle, as Illaoi's tentacles wreak havoc on the enemy team.

Weaknesses

While Illaoi possesses immense strength, she does have some weaknesses that can be exploited by skilled opponents. One of her main weaknesses is her lack of mobility. Illaoi has no dashes or blinks in her kit, making her susceptible to kiting and crowd control effects. Skilled opponents can use this to their advantage by keeping their distance and avoiding prolonged engagements.

Additionally, Illaoi's tentacles can be destroyed by enemies, limiting her ability to control the battlefield. Destroying tentacles not only reduces her damage output but also denies her healing from her passive ability. Smart opponents will focus on eliminating these tentacles whenever possible, reducing Illaoi's effectiveness in fights.

Illaoi's E ability, Test of Spirit, can also be a double-edged sword. While it provides her with a significant advantage when successfully used, it requires her to hit the enemy champion with a skillshot. Skilled opponents who can dodge or block this ability can negate a large portion of Illaoi's damage potential and turn the tables in their favor.

Illaoi in the Game

Illaoi is primarily played in the top lane, where her strength and sustain allow her to dominate melee matchups. Her ability to control the battlefield with her tentacles makes her a formidable force, and she can quickly turn fights in her favor with her ultimate ability.

When playing Illaoi, it is crucial to utilize her tentacles effectively. Positioning is key, as you want to maximize the number of tentacles available to attack your enemies. Placing tentacles near objectives or in areas where fights are likely to occur can give you a significant advantage in team fights and skirmishes.

Illaoi's playstyle revolves around aggression and punishing opponents who underestimate her. With her sustain and damage output, she can often win trades and come out on top in extended engagements. However, it is essential to be mindful of her weaknesses and play smart against opponents who can exploit them.

Overall, Illaoi is a powerful champion with a unique playstyle that rewards skilled players. Her strength, sustain, and ability to control the battlefield make her a force to be reckoned with in the top lane. If you're looking for a champion who can dominate melee matchups and turn team fights in your favor, Illaoi is an excellent choice.

For more information on Illaoi and to see videos of all her skins, visit our page dedicated to the Kraken Priestess on our League of Legends website.

Illaoi (Cosmic Invoker Illaoi)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 26, 2020

Illaoi, the Kraken Priestess, is a formidable champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her immense strength and connection to the mysterious depths of the sea, Illaoi has become a fan-favorite for those who enjoy dominating the top lane. In this article, we will delve into the details of Illaoi's Cosmic Invoker Illaoi skin, exploring its story and design, as well as providing an overview of Illaoi's strengths, weaknesses, and her place in the game.

The Cosmic Invoker Illaoi Skin

Cosmic Invoker Illaoi is a visually stunning skin that takes Illaoi's already imposing presence to a cosmic level. Released on November 26, 2020, this skin is priced at 1350 RP, offering players a chance to experience Illaoi in a whole new light.

The Cosmic Invoker Illaoi skin transforms Illaoi into a celestial being, adorned with cosmic armor and wielding a mystical staff. Her tentacles, which are a signature part of her kit, are now ethereal and shimmer with cosmic energy. The skin features beautiful cosmic effects, including starry trails and celestial particles, adding a touch of otherworldly power to Illaoi's abilities.

One of the standout features of the Cosmic Invoker Illaoi skin is the unique recall animation. When Illaoi recalls, she is lifted into the air by a cosmic force, surrounded by swirling galaxies. It's a visually stunning moment that perfectly captures the cosmic theme of the skin.

Overall, the Cosmic Invoker Illaoi skin is a must-have for Illaoi enthusiasts and collectors alike. Its breathtaking design and attention to detail make it a standout addition to any player's skin collection.

The Story of Illaoi

Illaoi, the Kraken Priestess, hails from the Serpent Isles, a treacherous and mysterious land shrouded in myth and legend. She is a powerful figure within the religion of Nagakabouros, a deity that embodies the strength and resilience of the sea. Illaoi serves as the physical manifestation of Nagakabouros' will, wielding her immense strength to protect her people and spread the teachings of her faith.

Illaoi's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that she was once a humble fisherman who discovered an ancient idol of Nagakabouros while out at sea. This encounter forever changed her life, as she became the chosen vessel of the deity's power. With her newfound abilities, Illaoi rose to prominence within her community, becoming a revered figure and protector of her people.

In the game, Illaoi is known for her incredible strength and durability. Her kit revolves around her tentacles, which she can summon to attack her enemies and defend herself. Illaoi's abilities allow her to dominate the top lane, making her a formidable opponent for anyone who dares to challenge her.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Illaoi's strengths lie in her ability to sustain herself in lane and deal massive damage to her opponents. Her passive ability, Prophet of an Elder God, allows her tentacles to spawn and attack nearby enemies, making it difficult for opponents to engage her without taking significant damage. Her Q ability, Tentacle Smash, allows her to slam the ground, damaging and slowing enemies in its path. This ability also spawns a tentacle that can attack enemies, further increasing her damage output.

Illaoi's E ability, Test of Spirit, is a skillshot that allows her to rip the spirit from an enemy champion. If the spirit is attacked, the enemy champion becomes vulnerable, taking additional damage from Illaoi's attacks. This ability is crucial for trading and all-ins, as it allows Illaoi to deal massive damage to her opponents.

However, Illaoi does have her weaknesses. She is heavily reliant on her tentacles for damage, so if her opponents can destroy or avoid them, her damage output is significantly reduced. Additionally, Illaoi lacks mobility, making her susceptible to ganks and crowd control effects. Skilled opponents can exploit these weaknesses and find ways to outmaneuver and outplay her.

Illaoi's Place in the Game

Illaoi is primarily played in the top lane, where her strength and durability allow her to dominate melee matchups. Her ability to sustain herself in lane and deal massive damage makes her a formidable split-pusher and teamfighter. In teamfights, Illaoi excels at zoning and disrupting the enemy team with her tentacles, making it difficult for opponents to engage or disengage effectively.

While Illaoi is a strong champion in the right hands, she does have her counters. Champions with high mobility and crowd control can make it challenging for Illaoi to land her abilities and deal damage. Additionally, champions that can poke from a distance and avoid all-ins can frustrate Illaoi and limit her effectiveness in lane.

Overall, Illaoi is a unique and powerful champion that offers a different playstyle compared to other top lane champions. Her strength, durability, and ability to deal massive damage make her a force to be reckoned with in the right hands.

For more information about Illaoi and to see her in action with all her different appearances, including the Cosmic Invoker Illaoi skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to Illaoi on the League of Legends website. There, you can find detailed information, videos, and more to help you master this powerful champion.

Illaoi (Snow Moon Illaoi)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: December 10, 2020

Illaoi, the Kraken Priestess, is a formidable champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her powerful tentacles and unwavering faith, Illaoi dominates the battlefield, striking fear into the hearts of her enemies. One of her most captivating skins is the

which transforms her into a mystical warrior of the winter moon.

The Snow Moon Illaoi skin is a visually stunning addition to Illaoi's repertoire. Clad in icy blue armor adorned with intricate snowflake patterns, Illaoi becomes an embodiment of the winter season. Her tentacles, usually dark and menacing, are now transformed into shimmering ice formations, adding an ethereal touch to her already intimidating presence. The skin also features new visual effects, such as icy particles and frosty animations, further enhancing the immersive experience.

Released on December 10, 2020, the Snow Moon Illaoi skin quickly became a fan favorite. Its unique design and attention to detail make it a must-have for Illaoi enthusiasts and collectors alike. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a significant visual upgrade to Illaoi's base appearance, making it well worth the investment for players who enjoy playing as the Kraken Priestess.

The Story of Illaoi

Illaoi's story is deeply rooted in the lore of League of Legends. Hailing from the Serpent Isles, Illaoi is a fierce warrior and spiritual leader of the Nagakabouros, a religious sect that worships the mysterious deity known as the

As the Kraken Priestess, Illaoi is tasked with defending her people and spreading the teachings of the Great Kraken.

In the game, Illaoi's abilities reflect her connection to the Kraken. Her passive ability, Prophet of an Elder God, allows her to summon tentacles that deal damage to enemies. These tentacles also play a crucial role in her ultimate ability, Leap of Faith, where Illaoi slams her idol into the ground, summoning tentacles to attack nearby enemies. This ability can quickly turn the tide of a team fight, as Illaoi's tentacles deal massive damage and can even heal her when they strike enemy champions.

Illaoi's playstyle revolves around her ability to control the battlefield and force her opponents into unfavorable situations. With her tentacles and powerful abilities, she excels in prolonged fights and can easily turn the tables on her enemies. However, she is vulnerable to crowd control effects and relies heavily on her tentacles for damage, making her somewhat predictable if her opponents can destroy or avoid them.

Illaoi's place in the game is primarily as a top lane bruiser. Her ability to sustain herself in lane and deal significant damage makes her a formidable opponent for melee champions. She can also be a valuable asset in team fights, where her ultimate ability can wreak havoc on the enemy team. However, she may struggle against champions with high mobility or ranged attacks, as they can easily kite her and avoid her tentacle strikes.

On this page, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Illaoi's appearances, including the Snow Moon Illaoi skin. Whether you're a fan of her base appearance or looking to add some winter magic to your gameplay, the Snow Moon Illaoi skin is a fantastic choice. Embrace the power of the winter moon and dominate the battlefield as the Kraken Priestess herself!

Illaoi (Resistance Illaoi)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 23, 2016

Resistance Illaoi is a skin for the powerful champion Illaoi in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on November 23, 2016, and is available for purchase at a cost of 1350 RP. With its unique design and thematic elements, Resistance Illaoi offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the champion.

The Resistance Illaoi skin transforms the fearsome Kraken Priestess into a valiant warrior fighting against the forces of darkness. Clad in heavy armor and wielding a massive anchor, Illaoi exudes strength and determination. Her armor is adorned with intricate details, showcasing her allegiance to the Resistance. The anchor she wields has been modified to serve as a weapon, with sharp blades and spikes added to enhance its effectiveness in battle.

One of the standout features of the Resistance Illaoi skin is the visual effects it brings to the champion's abilities. Illaoi's tentacles, which are a core part of her kit, are transformed into glowing blue energy constructs. These ethereal tentacles add a touch of mystique to her attacks, making her presence on the battlefield even more imposing. The skin also includes unique animations and sound effects, further enhancing the overall experience of playing as Resistance Illaoi.

Illaoi, the champion behind the Resistance Illaoi skin, is a formidable force on the Rift. Hailing from the Shadow Isles, Illaoi is a priestess of the Kraken who draws her power from the mysterious deity known as Nagakabouros. She is known for her immense strength and the ability to summon tentacles to aid her in battle. Illaoi's playstyle revolves around her ability to control the battlefield and punish her enemies with devastating tentacle slams.

Illaoi's kit is centered around her unique ability,
This ability allows her to mark an enemy champion with a spirit, which then tethers to the target. If the tether is not broken, Illaoi can unleash her ultimate ability,

which summons multiple tentacles to attack the tethered champion. This can quickly turn the tide of a team fight and make Illaoi a force to be reckoned with.

While Illaoi possesses immense strength and the ability to deal significant damage, she does have her weaknesses. Her lack of mobility makes her vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities. Additionally, her tentacles can be destroyed by enemies, limiting her ability to control the battlefield. However, in the right hands, Illaoi can be a terrifying force that can single-handedly turn the tide of a game.

In the world of League of Legends, Illaoi has made a name for herself as a powerful and fearsome champion. Her unique playstyle and thematic design have made her a favorite among players who enjoy a more aggressive and strategic approach to the game. With the Resistance Illaoi skin, players can now experience the thrill of battling against the forces of darkness as a valiant warrior.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Illaoi's various appearances, including the Resistance Illaoi skin. Whether you're a fan of Illaoi or simply curious about her abilities and playstyle, this page is your go-to resource for all things Illaoi.

Illaoi (Default)

Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Illaoi, the Kraken Priestess, is a formidable champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As a champion with a unique and captivating design, Illaoi has gained a significant following among players. Her default skin, which is the original appearance of the champion, showcases her powerful and intimidating presence on the battlefield.

Illaoi's default skin features her as a fierce and imposing figure, embodying the strength and resilience of the Kraken Priestess. She stands tall and muscular, with a commanding presence that demands attention. Her attire consists of a combination of tribal and nautical elements, reflecting her connection to the sea and her role as a spiritual leader.

Illaoi's default skin showcases her signature weapon, the enormous idol known as the

This massive idol is intricately designed, with intricate carvings and symbols that represent Illaoi's spiritual connection to the Kraken. The idol is held by Illaoi with both hands, emphasizing her immense strength and the weight of her spiritual authority.

The color scheme of Illaoi's default skin is predominantly earthy tones, with deep blues and greens that evoke the depths of the ocean. These colors not only reflect her connection to the sea but also add to her intimidating presence on the battlefield. The intricate details of her tattoos and facial markings further enhance her mystique and give her a distinct and memorable appearance.

Illaoi's default skin perfectly captures her essence as a powerful and enigmatic champion. Her design showcases her physical strength, spiritual connection, and unwavering determination. Whether she is leading her followers into battle or facing her enemies head-on, Illaoi's default skin is a testament to her indomitable spirit and her role as the Kraken Priestess.

Illaoi: The Kraken Priestess

Illaoi's story within the League of Legends universe is as captivating as her appearance. Hailing from the Serpent Isles, Illaoi is a revered figure among her people, known for her unwavering faith in the Great Kraken. As the Kraken Priestess, she is tasked with defending her homeland from any threats that may arise.

Illaoi's strength lies in her ability to summon the power of the Kraken, channeling its might through her idol, the Test of Spirit. With this immense power, she can create tentacles that strike fear into the hearts of her enemies. These tentacles not only deal devastating damage but also serve as vessels to test the spirits of her foes, forcing them to confront their deepest fears and doubts.

In battle, Illaoi is a force to be reckoned with. Her immense physical strength allows her to engage in close combat, while her spiritual connection to the Kraken grants her unparalleled power. She can summon tentacles to attack her enemies, and her ultimate ability, Leap of Faith, allows her to call upon the Kraken itself, dealing massive damage to all who stand in her way.

However, like any champion, Illaoi also has her weaknesses. Her reliance on tentacles makes her vulnerable to champions who can destroy or disable them, limiting her ability to deal damage. Additionally, her lack of mobility can make her an easy target for champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities.

Despite her weaknesses, Illaoi has found her place in the League of Legends game as a powerful top lane champion. Her unique playstyle and devastating abilities make her a formidable opponent in the hands of skilled players. With her default skin, players can fully immerse themselves in the role of the Kraken Priestess and experience the thrill of commanding the power of the sea.

On this page, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Illaoi's appearances in the game. Whether you prefer her default skin or want to explore her alternate skins, you can discover the full range of Illaoi's visual designs and immerse yourself in her captivating world.

Illaoi (Void Bringer Illaoi)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 10, 2016

Void Bringer Illaoi is a skin for the fearsome champion Illaoi in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on November 10, 2016, and is available for purchase at a cost of 1350 RP. With its unique design and captivating visual effects, Void Bringer Illaoi offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the champion.

The Void Bringer Illaoi skin transforms the already formidable Illaoi into a terrifying entity from the depths of the Void. The skin features Illaoi adorned in dark, otherworldly armor, with glowing purple accents that emanate an eerie aura. Her tentacles, which are a signature part of her kit, are now infused with the power of the Void, pulsating with energy and leaving a trail of purple mist in their wake.

One of the standout features of the Void Bringer Illaoi skin is the unique animations and visual effects it brings to the champion. Illaoi's abilities are enhanced with new particle effects, making her attacks and abilities feel even more impactful. The tentacles that she summons now have a distinct Void-inspired appearance, adding an extra layer of visual flair to her gameplay.

Furthermore, the voiceover for Illaoi is also modified in the Void Bringer Illaoi skin. Her voice takes on a more sinister tone, reflecting the dark power she wields as a Void entity. This adds an immersive element to the skin, enhancing the overall experience for players who choose to wield the power of the Void with Illaoi.

Now, let's delve into the story of Illaoi and her place in the League of Legends universe. Illaoi is a powerful and imposing champion who hails from the Serpent Isles, a treacherous and dangerous land filled with peril. She is the high priestess of a mysterious religion known as the Nagakabouros, which worships a massive kraken-like creature called the Great Kraken.

Illaoi's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is known that she was chosen by the Great Kraken to be its prophet and vessel. She possesses immense physical strength and a deep connection to the spirits of the Serpent Isles. Illaoi's abilities revolve around summoning tentacles from the ground, which she uses to attack and defend herself. These tentacles are an extension of the Great Kraken's power, and Illaoi channels its strength through them.

In the game, Illaoi is primarily played as a top lane bruiser. Her kit revolves around her tentacles, which she can summon and control to deal damage to her enemies. Illaoi's passive ability, Prophet of an Elder God, allows her tentacles to spawn periodically around her, attacking nearby enemies. Her Q ability, Tentacle Smash, allows her to slam a tentacle into the ground, damaging and potentially spawning more tentacles. Her W ability, Harsh Lesson, empowers her next basic attack to deal bonus damage and cause her tentacles to attack the target. Her E ability, Test of Spirit, allows her to cast a skillshot that attaches to an enemy champion, revealing their spirit. If the spirit is attacked, the enemy champion becomes vulnerable and takes damage. Finally, her ultimate ability, Leap of Faith, summons a massive tentacle that slams down in a target area, damaging and slowing enemies.

Illaoi's playstyle revolves around controlling the battlefield with her tentacles and punishing enemies who dare to challenge her. Her immense sustain and damage output make her a formidable force in team fights, especially when she can set up multiple tentacles to attack her enemies simultaneously. However, she lacks mobility and can be vulnerable to crowd control effects, making her susceptible to coordinated ganks and focused burst damage.

With the Void Bringer Illaoi skin, players can now experience Illaoi's power in a whole new light. The skin's unique design and visual effects add an extra layer of excitement to playing Illaoi, allowing players to unleash the power of the Void with this fearsome champion.

For more information about Illaoi and to see all of her appearances in the game, including the Void Bringer Illaoi skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to Illaoi on the League of Legends website. There, you can find detailed information, videos, and more to help you master this powerful champion.
